name: mikroe.click.iotexpresslink3
short_description: IoT ExpressLink 3 Click is a compact add-on board that allows users to connect easily to IoT ExpressLink services and securely interact with cloud applications and other devices. This board features the NORA-W256WS, a standalone multi-radio module from u-blox. The module supports Wi-Fi radio at 802.11b/g/n standard and 2.4GHz of ISM band. It also supports the Bluetooth Low Energy 5. The embedded AWS IoT ExpressLink-compliant software includes secured pre-flashed certificates in the module.
